# StructuredStream

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="StructuredStream" symbolName="StructuredStream" /> StructuredStream

A synchronous stream of partial structured outputs from an LLM.

This class supports iteration to process structured outputs as they arrive from the
model.


**Alias to:** `mirascope_v2_llm.responses.StructuredStream`
